BUSH HOTEL IN MULDERSDRIFT GAUTENG

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Noto Serif||||||||” header_text_color=”#222222″ header_font_size=”31px” header_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”-4px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

WELCOME TO OUR 26° SOUTH

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Open Sans||||||||” text_text_color=”#5f6060″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”-4px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”-12px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”-12px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

26 Degree South Hotel offers all the creature comforts required for an unforgettable stay, within the soothing serenity of the African bush. The Magaliesberg mountain range forms a picturesque backdrop for weddings, corporate getaways and leisure seekers alike. Situated within the Cradle Moon Conservancy in Muldersdrift Gauteng, this private reserve provides the opportunity to escape the bustle of the city but is a convenient 20 minute drive from Lanseria International Airport and 1 hour drive from OR Tambo.

The hotel boasts 76 spacious rooms, stylishly appointed and over-looking our sparkling pool and the bushveld beyond. Each room offers free WiFi, selected DSTV channels, individual air-conditioning, a hairdryer, bath and shower combination with amenities, and tea/coffee making facilities. The conservancy is situated on the banks of a picturesque river and has a myriad of general species of game including, black and blue wildebeest, crocodile, rhino and hippo to name a few.

Whether it’s a romantic getaway for two, family weekend away, conferencing or team building, a weekend wedding, or just a quick getaway, 26 Degree South is sure to meet the expectations of the most discerning of traveler.

All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. With a private bathroom fitted with a bath and free toiletries, rooms at the hotel also have pool view. Guest rooms at 26 Degree South Hotel are fitted with a seating area.

COME HAVE FUN IN THE SUN WITH THE FAMILY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Noto Serif||||||||” header_text_color=”#222222″ header_font_size=”31px” header_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”-6px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

HOTEL’S ONSITE ACTIVITES 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”https://bushcampsite.co.za/activities/” button_text=”EXPLORE ACTIVITES ” button_alignment=”right” button_alignment_tablet=”” button_alignment_phone=”center” button_alignment_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”12px” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#C1B086″ button_border_width=”1px” button_border_color=”#C1B086″ button_border_radius=”100px” button_letter_spacing=”1px” button_font=”Open Sans|700|||||||” button_use_icon=”off” z_index=”999″ custom_margin=”30px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”-20px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”17px|48px|17px|48px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”on” button_letter_spacing__hover=”1px” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_bg_color__hover=”#3F9CC1″ button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_border_color__hover=”#3F9CC1″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”1169px” custom_padding=”5px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

“Do I need to get in my car again and go look for something to do?”   26 Degree South to the rescue!  We’re got you covered. We want you to feel at home at our home. We offer a range of on-site activities that needs little more than putting your exploring shoes on. One foot at a time.

custom_margin_tablet=”-32px||16px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”-31px||13px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

6 STATE OF THE ART VENUES 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Noto Serif||||||||” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”31px” header_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

CONFERENCE FACILITIES

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Open Sans||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”-4px||||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Looking for something more than the usual conference experience? 26 Degree South caters for all conferences, big and small. As a conference venue with accommodation, we have conference packages that include overnight hotel stays. So put your feet up with a hot cuppa in our business lounge and enjoy one of the best conference and corporate event venues in Muldersdrift.

excerpt.rendered: BUSH HOTEL IN MULDERSDRIFT GAUTENGWELCOME TO OUR 26° SOUTH26 Degree South Hotel offers all the creature comforts required for an unforgettable stay, within the soothing serenity of the African bush. The Magaliesberg mountain range forms a picturesque backdrop for weddings, corporate getaways and leisure seekers alike. Situated within the Cradle Moon Conservancy in Muldersdrift Gauteng, […]
